attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. 6 YEAR/150 000KM WARRANTY ; 3 YEAR/60 000KM SERVICE PLAN
Our diamond, the Almera, is a smart sedan that is comfortable, affordable, spacious and eco-friendly. Designed to have a presence on the road, the Nissan Almera has smooth curves with an unapologetic front grille and sporty headlamps.
The interior is designed for comfort. With ergonomically designed seating, quality materials and an evolved textured design that is geared to reduce glare from sunlight into the driver’s eyes.
Spacious is not just a throw-away description. The boot features a class-leading 490 litres of luggage space with a deep loading area. So there’s plenty of room, with comfortable seating that’s designed to be relaxing, even on longer trips.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215128. A Wonderful drive with comfortable leather seats. 
It has a near-perfect blend of good looks, great performance, generous standard kit and decent pricing.
The cabin is quiet at motorway speeds, there are no nasty shakes or cheap rattles and everything closes, clicks and connects smoothly.
The infotainment system uses Ford’s Sync 3 technology, which has good functionality
Additional extras to mention are: Lane Departure Warning; Rear Seatbelt Reminder as well as Hill Start Assist
